channel.title: [PI]Help[PI]
channel.description:
First off,
How may I Lower the Defence required for turmoil?
Also How might i make it so it can have some attempts before not able to log on if you enter the wrong password.

item.title: [PI]Help[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Near_hell Near_hell
item.description:
@Near_hell wrote:

Go to Combat Assit and Serach - Turmoil - And then u will see this and change that " < 70 { " to < “Defence level you want it” { Eg… < 20 { … ( And to change the Name From 70 Defence Change this c.sendMessage(“You need 70 Defence to use Turmoil”); to c.sendMessage(“You need 20 Defence to use Turmoil”);
}
if (i == 24 && c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < 70) {
c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[i], 0);
c.sendMessage(“You need 70 Defence to use Turmoil”);
return;

Read full topic
